tldr: If your 'git-commit-id' comes from a potentially untrusted source (e.g., an API), an attacker could manipulate it to execute shell commands, such as: `./manage.py lintmigrations --git-commit-id '; rm -rf dangerous'`, potentially running harmful code.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version of this package <= 5.0.0.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `django-migration-linter` library to the patch version.
